comments.comment:
"I want you guys to do well, I genuinely do."

The sentiment is 100% mutual, Pewds.
Never thought I'd watch Pewdiepie talking about Greek philosophy while the sun makes him look like an enlightened being, but here we are and somehow it's pretty awesome
It’s crazy how Felix’s philosophy has evolved through the years. Bjorn’s dad is literally a philosopher lmao
I love listening to Felix talk about serious things. Very accomplished and sensible human who’s down to earth and intelligent.

I never thought a Swedish man living in Japan would have shaped my childhood and now my young adulthood as a 23 year old. Who we observe and what we watch really does become who we are over time. It’s amazing to see him thriving now as a father with Marzia.
Best advice I got was "Don't do motivation, do discipline." so instead of phyching yourself up to do something, you just drag yourself to start and it just goes. Inertia is a powerful thing.

6:34 hit deep, all my life I've tried to set goals to 'achieve.' Then I would get super upset when I don't reach it or I easily just quit because the goal ended up being harder than I thought.. I've never tried to set goals so that I build myself and for my own lifestyle- It all makes sense now... WILL TRY THIS NEW WAY OF THINKING. THANK YOU!!
These videos feel like a never ending epilogue to a series I didn't want to end.
as a person, you have turned out in literally the best possible way. so much respect
Thank you Pewdiepie, very inspirational

I just wanna say I extremly appreciate Pewd's videos like these. It feels like we've been maturing together over the years. I love that fact that I clicked for some humor but I got the most interesting philosophy video i have watched in a while, unexpectedly (this  has happened multiple times). I am truly so grateful for this content Thank u Felix

Literally stopped in the middle of the video to apply for college. I’ve been procrastinating on doing it cause I was scared on making my next big step in life. Thank you so much! This has really inspired me

that was actually very motivating.
Thank Pewds for showing that you can be crazy famous but still humble.
I always love it when pewds opens up about his own problems. The bit about drinking too much alcohol was not too much information btw. We all love you Felix and thank you for the video
I am constantly surprised how much old philosophy can teach us about modern problems.
Felix has always been a kind, morally decent person and with all his new wisdom he is becoming an influencer that our soceity needs!
If Felix would start a podcast when he has time in the future I would definitely be tuning in. His look on things are very interesting to hear and learn.
"To overcome our limitations it's a difficult climb but that's up there where the true beauty lies" thanks pewds I really needed that

My man. I stopped watching you several years ago and today I saw your video for the first time in that long time. I am a very happy man that you already are a father. Time is really flying and I really appreciate it. Appreciate your hard work in the past and now, your bright present. Take care man. Thank you for all your videos and for all your hard work. You absolutely deserve everything that you have now.
From a cool bro to a wise papa..... thank u papa pewds ......... Happy holidays  and best wishes
Pewds is like our big brother at this point, giving us good and realistic advice instead of idealised nonsense. So cool growing up alongside him and maturing.

Watching this makes me realize how mature he is and also, how good of a dad he's going to be.  I've always known that he is so articulate and such a deep thinker, which is why he has earned my respect but this video just made me admire him more. You're going to be a great role model for your son, Pews! Great video!
you’re the best felix, this video really helped me so much. you’re so good at explaining philosophy and Bjorn looks so cute, i hope you and marzia are doing great!
i’m always grateful for these videos, it’s like a reality check reminding me that i’m alive and able.

This is the type pf motivational content I would consume if there were more like this. Its not something that takes advantage of someones insecurities, rather, it helps you address them and have a better relationship with yourself

I've been watching pewds for more than ten years and I like how Felix went from screaming into a mic in video games to literally talking and analyzing philosophical subjects while helping the bros out with what he finds. Not gonna lie, That's really heart warming and that's pretty darn cool. Thanks pewds. On a side note, I was in one of your videos pewds. I hope one day I can be a bit famous so I can tell you about it.

Super cool that Felix is still making videos, even though he doesn't have to, he just does it for fun now and to spread positivity. This is something our society really needs right now, especially our youth. Kudos!

It’s kinda crazy to see how good Felix’s speech has gotten. I can still remember when pewds was still doing Fridays with PewDiePie and to see the growth not just in speech but also his content is quite an experience.
Went from getting jump scared with Pewds to learning philosophy with Pewds what a blessing thanks for the knowledge bruv

thank you pewds. Seriously, it is so refreshing to see a youtuber who advocates philosophy and the wellbeing of their audiences and the nourishment of the soul. 
  To add on to what he says about self-examination, I think journalling and meditation would do you a ton of good, but it also comes down to what you want to be (atomic habits delves deeper into it)
Felix giving genuine motivation for a video I thought was going to be silly was unexpected but very welcome
It's kinda crazy how Pewds is the one who got me into making YouTube videos.
He's so enlightened he's emanating light from his head, guys this is it, this is self actualization!
Motivational videos hit different at 3 AM, make you wanna turn your whole life around
People don’t need motivation they need discipline the earlier you realize the difference the better you become

gotta admit this is the first vid i’ve watched from pewds in about five years and i was mind blown by how much i needed to listen and open myself more to actually practicing the philosophy that i’ve wanted to. thank you and congrats on becoming a father!

Really needed this video, very motivational. You’ll never grasp how perfect the timing for this video was, thank you so much Pewds <3 you’re already sort of like a dad to millions of bros, you’re gonna be the absolute best dad to Björn!

4:57 "We are literally standing on the shoulders of giants, why not take advantage of it?"
- Felix Kjellberg, Swedish Philosopher 2023

2:31 Chapter 1: Habits
7:37 Chapter 1.5 An Ancient Habit (Gfuel Advert)
8:42 Chapter 2: Action
11:58: Goals 
 Björn time (Nord VPN Advert)
It’s insane how much his videos have evolved. He literally grew up with his audience.
I feel inspired for the first time in 30 years. Thank you pewdiepie.

I think one of the main reasons you don't struggle with motivation (aside from genetic factors), is the fact that you had a healthy childhood, raised by two loving and healthy parents who could provide what you needed to stay healthy psychologically and physically.
In our depraved, godless culture, it has become way too common for people to underestimate or downplay the importance of the nuclear family.
I'm glad someone like you exists

I just finished my essay at 12 AM and i felt so exhausted and demotivated, but this video resonated to me on  another level. I can not explain, i feel like what you said i will remember forever, and it is so pleasant to hear it from you, you say it so kindly and with so much care, that I don’t feel shame compared to other motivational videos. I would love to see more videos on topics like these. I also love that i found out you’re sober, gives me strength to keep my own streak going
Thank you pewds. Your last two videos have brought a tear to my eye and made me feel ways I can’t imagine. You’ll be a great dad sir.
I absolutely love how you broke everything down... going into detail and making these concepts applicable,  while still being funny and lighthearted.  Love you Felix

"Maybe you want to quit, when things fail. But you can't just fail when things quit"

Still remember this quote in my heart after all these years

Been watching you since 2012 and I always took your advise. Especially when I was struggling in school, genuinely helped me to be stronger and have a better mindset that made people enjoy me being with them. Thank you for everything since then
I like this newer and self-improved version of Felix. You’re videos went from all games and play to some real life thought provoking content. Serious Wise Papa vibes.
I really love these kind of videos. It's like a small therapy session. Thanks Pewds
that sunlight in his room makes it looks like he is in heaven
Crazy how u can change so many people’s perspective just by how u express yourself. Thank you PewDiePie. Happy new year!

I’ve been going to the gym almost daily for a few months now and it’s mainly thanks to content creators like you and the good people I have around me. I’m at the point where I can see changes in my body and it feels great. Thanks!
"Just do it" and "never give up" are 2 videos that will live in my head forever
still pumping out high quality content after over a decade and a baby. such a legend

I strive for what I want too, I went from losing everything, to gaining everything, all because I practiced these values of doing good habits, one day I couldn't make anything right, then the next I have a family of my own and a truly lovely life with an amazing person I strive to love for the rest of my life... I grew up watching you pewds, and it feels like we both accomplished a lot in the time I've watched your channel  cudos

Talking as the middle monitor Pewds talked to the whole video, thank you. Sometimes we all struggle and just hearing someone remind you about all the ideas people came up with to deal with life is great. Seeing you genuinely want to help others is awesome. Enjoy your dad life to the fullest!
I won’t lie I struggle with motivation and laziness a lot.. and this video really puts that in perspective for me. Thank you pewds I’ll do my best to work harder and stop sleeping so much    . :D
You know it’s a good day when PEWDIEPIE uploads
I appreciate your capacity to be so funny, knowledgeable, caring, and creative. I think there is something for everyone in your videos. Keep being amazing and thank you for supporting your fans :)
It took me a couple minutes to realise Pewds showed up fully ready to be helpful, this was extremely useful...
I am truly motivated to keep watching YouTube
요즘 우울하고 힘들고 기운도 없는데 영상보고 많이 웃고 힘도 얻는 거 같네요! 사람들도 안 만나고 기운이 없는데 감사해요! 저도 다른 사람에게 웃음을 주는 유튜버가 될게요
Watching you since I was 12, and now I am approaching 21 ready to enter the workforce. I have grown with you and many Pewds here. Always love you.
I feel motivation tearing me apart after watching this video. I feel that I can continue to live. Thank you PewDiePie

I started watching your videos when I was around 17, rn I’m 27 and growing learning from such a wise man and watching you evolve has been amazing. I started reading philosophy because of you and its the best thing that could’ve happen to me, I really appreciate your existance, Felix Kjellberg, bro fist and a big hug all the way from México.

That's why we prefer Pewdiepie now, he's got nothing left to prove and he's become a Father.
His philosophy shows the point of this society and how the world is.

Thanks dude. I really needed it, nowadays life feels frustrating and for me rn it is hard, but the realisation that it would be even more difficult in the future is kinda depressing. I hope u stay happy and healthy with your fam

Aww Pewds, this is very sweet. I'm a week and a half out from my pregnancy due date and feeling very intimidated. I have so much love and support around me, I can't complain about anything, I just feel overwhelmed with the upcoming HUGE life change. This morning, the overwhelm made me feel like staying in bed and doing nothing all day, but I knew it would be bad for my mental health, so I chose to get up and cleaned the house instead. It was nice to have this video come on while I did my chores. It provided some profound reassurance. Sometimes something down-to-earth like this makes all the difference in the world, especially since I grew up with your videos. 

Hope you and your family are doing well. Merry Christmas and God bless ️
i missed watching pewds for quite a long time, feels really refreshing listening to him giving us such a well-put important talk

5:57
"Take your life"

Thank you for this incredible suggestion. I will be working towards it right now

Hey Pewds. Just want to say if you don't struggle with motivation, it's because you have good discipline. That's mostly it!
God, I love Pewds. I can’t believe it’s been nearly 10 years since I originally subbed.

I grew up with you pewdz and now I’m a grown man. Wild to see how far we’ve both come in our own way even tho we don’t know each other personally. Thank you for all the laughs and lessons. For me they mean more than you know
Dude started giving treasure knowledge out of randomly joking,  was so unexpected, always been my hero  love you felix
2:03 bro is literally me
Everytime Pewds drops a philosophy video i reconsider my life a bit and puts me into perspective. Thanks for sharing something so valuable, bro

you might not even read this but , thank you man very much , these type of vids really help you know , especially when a lot of us struggle with finding our purpose , hearing you just speak about these stuff and genuinely care for your viewers sake is really something to be thankful for , stay safe pewds ️

Hey felix i just wanted to say that ive been watching your videos since youve started but that this one i cant appreciate enough. Ive been fighting addiction for a while but youve helped me to understand what path i need to take to stop and take my life in my own hands. Now i just have to become a man of good habit, but ill do it nonetheless. Sincerely, Thank you so much for all these laughs youve provided me with all these years :)
6:43 this is genuinely a very good advice, habits would not necessarily get you to point A to point B just because it worked with another person
Everyone knows Big Man Tyrone always provides the best inspirational videos.
Bro has so much wisdom , love you pewds

Felix is like so close having watched his philosophical progression and having been through a similar one I feel very confident that he’s on his way to the final philosophical destination he’s gonna laugh when he gets there
Nice of pewds to acknowledge a much smaller philosopher 7:59

Pewds' motivational videos are unironically nice treats. The subjects he brings up are often intriguing and he doesn't need to sound pretentious and arrogant like those shady self-help gurus out there.
literally the best motivational and self improvement video on YouTube right now, makes it so wholesome and sad at the same time
This is the best motivational video you can ever watch.
2:50 plato️ playdough️
Damn bro, Bjorn’s dad is literally speaking facts
Never fails to amaze me that these videos come the day after I feel extremely depressed

Damn bruh I was a big fan of PewDiePie since 2015 and the last time i watched him was way back 2022. I didn't know he does videos like this now. This is really wholesome and as a psychology student this really gave me motivation!!
As a person who lost a loved one to inspirational videos, thank you so much for sharing your knowledge
your evolution as a person and a creator is inspiring in itself. you’re very wise! i love hearing your thoughts. keep being awesome bro

“Life shouldn’t just be a string of repeated motions. A lot of the best things in life come from spontaneity.”

Damn Felix. Out here philosophizing. 
If always struggled with the habit game and maximizing productivity. I’ve finally started to come to a balance, thanks for reaffirming that balance
As a Greek person I can confirm that Pewdiepie knows more about the Greek history than my history teacher
All I need to be motivated is watch Felix grow
Watching motivational videos makes me feel like I'm admitting defeat.
Felix Never fails to upload incredibly motivating content
Deep down, you know you can do something great. You know that you can do more than you’re doing right now.

Felix you are unironically exactly what people asked of you for. I imagine you probably have a serious weight on your shoulders with so many people looking to you for this or that, but I think we can all agree, it’s because you already provide that by being you. So thanks for being you, we all love and appreciate you. And a personal thanks because you’re a major reason in why I started reading on stoicism and other philosophy as well as a great motivation in quitting my drinking habits. You’ve never met me or probably even seen one of my comments before, but you’ve made a major contribution to who I am for the better. So thanks, Bro fist.
